p: Results: For CNCOcal, the Bland-Altman analysis resulted in a mean difference of -0.2 L/min, a standard deviation of ±0.5 L/min and limits of agreement of -1.1 to +0.7 L/min. The PE and CCR were 18 % and 100 %, respectively. For CNCObio, the Bland-Altman analysis resulted in a mean difference of +0.5 L/min, a standard deviation of ±1.1 L/min and limits of agreement of -1.6 to +2.6 L/min. The PE and CCR were 43 % and 94 %, respectively.
